title: 870. Isaiah 42:10-12
verses:
Sing a new hymn to Yahweh!
Let his praise resound
from the ends of the earth,
let the sea and all that it holds sing his praises,
the islands and those who inhabit them.
Let the desert and its cities raise their voice....
Let the inhabitants...
shout from the mountain tops.
Let them give glory to Yahweh.
